io.hgc.jarspec

Interface ExceptionBehaviour


  • public interface ExceptionBehaviour
    Mixin providing convenience method for Specifications making statements about exception behaviour

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default <T extends Throwable>
      SpecificationNode      		 itThrows(Class<T> throwable, String forCase, Test testCase)
      Statement that a unit should throw a specific exception for a particular case

    • Method Detail

      • itThrows

        default <T extends Throwable> SpecificationNode itThrows(Class<T> throwable,
                                                         String forCase,
                                                         Test testCase)
        Statement that a unit should throw a specific exception for a particular case
        Type Parameters:
        T - the expected exception type
        Parameters:
        throwable - the class of the expected exception type
        forCase - a description of the case in which it should be thrown
        testCase - an implementation of the case in which is should be thrown
        Returns:
        a Specification representing the single description
